thread.title: David Consulting Group Advances to Scaled Agile Framework® (SAFe®) Certified Silver Partner
thread.title_full: David Consulting Group Advances to Scaled Agile Framework® (SAFe®) Certified Silver Partner

author: PRWEB
title: David Consulting Group Advances to Scaled Agile Framework® (SAFe®) Certified Silver Partner
text:
Having led and hosted SAFe training classes and client engagements in the past year, we’re more confident than ever that the SAFe framework is the best practice for scaling Agile in any environment. Malvern, PA
David Consulting Group ( http://www.davidconsultinggroup.com ), a global provider of software analytics, software quality management and Agile development solutions, has announced its advancement to a Silver-Level Partnership with Scaled Agile, Inc. (SAI). SAI is the exclusive certifying entity for the Scaled Agile Framework ® (SAFe®).
“Having led and hosted SAFe training classes and client engagements in the past year, we’re more confident than ever that the SAFe framework is the best practice for scaling Agile in any environment,” said Mike Harris, President of David Consulting Group and certified SAFe Program Consultant (SPC). “Our status as a Silver-Level Partner will help us to more effectively share the framework and its value with our clients and those taking on scaled Agile initiatives for the first time.”
“David Consulting Group has been an invested partner with us as the need for scaling Agile is growing across industries and organizations,” said Dean Leffingwell, Chief Methodologist and creator of the Scaled Agile Framework. “Our partners are key players in disseminating SAFe practices and helping organizations to navigate the challenges that come with scaling Agile; we’re looking forward to working with DCG as the company grows its partnership commitment.”
As a Silver Partner, DCG’s clients will have access to proven Scaled Agile materials and thought leadership, as well as certified SAFe classes featuring approved courseware. More information about David Consulting Group’s SAFe solutions and consulting services is available on the company website. More information about the framework is available on the Scaled Agile, Inc. website .
About David Consulting Group
DCG is a global provider of software analytics, software quality management and Agile development solutions. Since 1994, companies of all sizes who depend on their software have relied on DCG to meet their standards and deliver valuable improvements at the right price. DCG maintains a U.S. corporate office in Malvern, Pa, and a European corporate office, DCG-SMS, in the U.K. For more information, visit http://www.davidconsultinggroup.com .
About Scaled Agile, Inc.
Based in Boulder, Colorado, USA, privately-held SAI’s mission is to help software-dependent companies achieve better outcomes, increase employee engagement, and improve business economics through adoption of Lean-Agile principles and practices based on the Scaled Agile Framework. A 2014 winner of the Red Herring North America Top 100 Award, SAI supports tens of thousands of practitioners of the Framework through training, certification, consulting services, and a global partner network that reaches over 35 countries and 350 cities
Visit http://www.ScaledAgile.com for more details.
